messages.subject: Re: Unschooling BlogCarnival - looking for submissions
messages.msgSnippet: Thanks Rue, in that case, I think there is no point in starting another blog carnival about unschooling.  Good to hear that Unschooling Voices is continuing!
messages.messageBody:
Thanks Rue,

in that case, I think there is no point in starting another blog
carnival about unschooling. Good to hear that Unschooling Voices is
continuing!

warmly,
jenn

messages.subject: Re: Unschooling BlogCarnival - looking for submissions
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Diana, for the first carnival I am leaving it open to all unschooling oriented posts. I think as time goes on, having a theme might be a good direction.
messages.messageBody:
Hi Diana,

for the first carnival I am leaving it open to all unschooling
oriented posts.

I think as time goes on, having a theme might be a good direction.

warmly,
jenn

messages.subject: Unschooling BlogCarnival - looking for submissions
messages.msgSnippet: Hello, I am not new to this group, mostly just taking things in... I have recently started a blog carnival with the intention of uniting some of us who blog
messages.messageBody:
Hello,

I am not new to this group, mostly just taking things in...

I have recently started a blog carnival with the intention of uniting
some of us who blog about our unschooling experiences. As far as I
know, Unschooling Voices (a previous unschooling blog carnival) is no
longer being published. Here is the link to the carnival I have
created http://blogcarnival.com/bc/cprof_2356.html

If you are unfamiliar with blog carnivals (I was not too long ago!),
they are blog posts published on a regular shedule (in this case
monthly) with links to others' blog posts on a related theme/topic.

The first edition is due to be published on my blog September 10.

Hope to hear from some of you :)

warmly,
jenn

__________________________________________________________________
http://www.livingalaska.blogspot.com
